titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Walocel MW 3000 PFV.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Methyl Hydroxyethyl Cellulose with a 30% or greater content of 2-hydroxyethyl methyl ether cellulose reaction products with glyoxal (Walocel MW 3000 PFV).
